Title: Cheaper by the Dozen
Writer: Lamar Trotti (screen play), Frank B. Gilbreth Jr. (based on the novel by), Ernestine Gilbreth Carey (based on the novel by)
Actors: Clifton Webb, Jeanne Crain, Myrna Loy, Betty Lynn
Plot: "Cheaper By the Dozen", based on the real-life story of the Gilbreth family, follows them from Providence, Rhode Island to Montclair, New Jersey, and details the amusing anecdotes found in large families. Frank Gilbreth, Sr., was a pioneer in the field of motion study, and often used his family as guinea pigs (with amusing and sometimes embarrassing results). He resisted popular culture,railing against his daughters' desires for bobbed hair and cosmetics.
